p: Regarding the lack of regulation, PBMs can be adulterated and contaminated in countries where purity and quality control are negligent [ 12, 32]. In many cases, these adulterated products can cause significant health problems [ 32]. Ayurvedic products are often prepared with inorganic active compounds, which when combined with environmental pollution (such as pesticides), can increase the content of heavy metals above the permissible limits [ 32].
